issue.title: Enhance installation process
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Once package installation is done, you get a relative "poor" screen with the minimum info.

This screen should be used to inform the user and give a better experience with :

- saying thank you for installation EasySDI
- give a link to www.easysdi.org and forge.easysdi (forum, wiki,...)
- add EasySDI logo
- add a direct link to EasySDI dashboard (home of the component)
